ValidationRule.description: Mortgage must have the corresponding line of product to be added
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( Opportunity.RecordType.DeveloperName= "Mortgage", NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product2.Family, "JN Bank Mortgage Loan")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Product2.Family, "JN Bank Insurance Premium Financing"))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This product is not apart of the Mortgage Line of Products. Please add a product corresponding to the mortgage's lines of product or create a new opportunity with a different record type that matches the line of product.
